Name: DEPRESS-EGRESS
checklistText:
<size=22>S/C DEPRESSURIZATION AND EGRESS</size>
	
RECORD 					- CONT
CABIN AIR RECIRC 			- DOWN (CLOSED)
OAMS Controller Power		- OFF
OAMS Prop Motor Valves 	- CLOSED
CABIN VENT 				- DOWN (OPEN)

Wait until the CABIN PRESSURE is zero:
CABIN VENT 				- UP (CLOSED)

Open the HATCH using the [C] menu

ATTITUDE CONTROL 			- PULSE
PLATFORM 					- ORB RATE

When ready to exit the vehicle, press the EVA button in the [C] menu. To enter, press the ENTER button in the open hatch on the outside.

Steps.Text: Wait until the CABIN PRESSURE is zero
Open the HATCH using the [C] menu
To exit the vehicle, press the EVA button in the [C] menu
